availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer. Native of Germany. Married to Mary Ott. Father of Christopher Ott, Catharine Ott, Elizabeth Ott, Mary Ott, Frances Ott, Barbara Ott, Annie Ott, Henry W. Ott, and Rosa Ott. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, p. 109.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United states (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Precinct 1, 388A.
